title: Court rejects Twitter’s claim of right to alert Trump to Jan. 6 search
description: The company can still ask the U.S. Supreme Court to say Twitter had a First Amendment right to alert Donald Trump to a subpoena.

title: 4 easy upgrades to your digital life
description: Update the software on your WiFi router. Pick a slower delivery speed. Or try a visual search feature. Then declare victory!

title: Biden administration hopes chips will give it an election year boost
description: A new center to coordinate government and private industry’s research efforts on computer semiconductors is the latest move by the administration to bring focus to U.S. chip manufacturing.
